name: angular-app-server
description: Back end server to support our angular app

scripts.test: npm run setup; npm run compile; node ./node_modules/grunt-cli/bin/grunt
scripts.setup: node ./node_modules/compy/bin/compy -d client install & node ./node_modules/compy/bin/compy -d mobile install
scripts.watch: node ./node_modules/compy/bin/compy -d client -o webapp -s server.js server watch
scripts.watchmob: node ./node_modules/compy/bin/compy -d mobile -o mobapp -s server.js server watch
